page.title: 15THE LIBRARY.
page.content: The library has been in use for 10 years.It contains 3974 adult books and 1456 junior books.398 adults are registered users of the library and 160 juniors.Vans go out to visit the outlying areas on a regular basis,catering for those who cannot travel to Bellingham.The library is open only on a part-time basis,on a Tuesday morning,and on Wednesdays and Fridays.The library provides a special service for the old peoples'homes in the area,stocking books there so that the elderly do not have to walk into the village.Two librarians are employed,both of whom are qualified. The most popular books,apart from fiction are local reference books on Northumberland.
